name: Building up (60productions)
description:
Kroger the turtle isn't evil but he wants to ruin your day. While building the dang turtle screws up everything so you have to chase him to win.

You don't actually build in this game

The game is a dollar.

HUGE NOTICE: this isn't bonus bros that game isn't finished yet.

How to play: you know most of it. The game is pretty hard, bet you can't speedrun it.

Developer: LarrioWings

Spriter: LarrioWings, Lgames

Contributor: FryingTheVictory
